# Lion's Charge (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 133

*You cast the spell and a nimbus of yellow energy in the form of a lion surrounds you.*

This spell grants you the [[S3.1N-Q - Universal Monster Rules N-Q (Bestiary 6 Apx)|pounce]] special ability, allowing you to make a full attack at the end of a charge.
